title: The Claude Code Renaissance
subtitle: AI coding agents aren't coming—they're here and multiplying.

title: The Bet
subtitle: Local AI believers are going all-in — and the tooling to back it up is maturing fast.

title: The Agent Gap
subtitle: Everyone's talking about agents. A tiny fraction are actually building with them. The chasm is widening.

title: The OpenClaw Explosion
subtitle: OpenClaw hit escape velocity. Your timeline is wall-to-wall agent flex — 6-agent teams, 30-job-a-day workflows, and multi-Claude orchestration.

title: The Great Repatriation
subtitle: Open-source models are eating the frontier. On-prem is eating the cloud. Your AIR thesis just got its biggest week of validation yet.
